name: Oh My Plane
description:
Oh My Plane is a game like a Flappy Bird. It's simple, fun and difficult.

By tapping you can save your plane.

Four different planes have own speed. When a game is started, plane is selected by random.

Please, save your plane!

GameCenter is supported.

This game is made by using following resources
* Images, Sound resources from kenney (http://kenney.nl)
* Technical hints from "2D iOS & tvOS games by Tutorials" (https://www.raywenderlich.com/)
* All musics are composed by using GarageBand's loops
